item.title: Ecopetrol 计划在哥伦比亚港口再建一个液化天然气进口终端
item.description: 由于哥伦比亚面临液化天然气日益短缺的问题，Ecopetrol SA 公司正在敲定一项计划，将哥伦比亚港口的一部分配置成进口液化天然气的设施。【原文：Ecopetrol SA is finalizing a plan to configure part of a Colombian port into a facility to import liquefied natural gas as the nation faces a growing shortfall of the fuel.】

item.title: 阿根廷连续第五天抛售美元，财政部耗尽储备金
item.description: 据两位直接知情人士透露，阿根廷政府周一连续第五个交易日在外汇市场抛售美元，试图阻止比索汇率下滑。【原文：Argentina’s government sold dollars in the foreign-exchange market Monday for a fifth straight session as it tries to stem a slide in the peso, according to two people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会调查 AppLovin 数据收集行为
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国证券交易委员会一直在调查移动广告技术公司 AppLovin 公司的数据收集行为。该公司股价下滑。【原文：The Securities and Exchange Commission has been probing the data-collection practices of the mobile advertising tech company AppLovin Corp., according to people familiar with the matter. The company’s shares slid.】

item.title: 华尔街以 3 倍 ETF 出价测试监管机构的风险偏好
item.description: 三家基金管理公司希望出售交易所交易基金，这些基金可以将特斯拉、比特币和其他资产的波动放大到罕见的程度，为再次考验监管机构对超风险产品的容忍度创造了条件。【原文：A trio of money managers want to sell exchange-traded funds that amp up swings in Tesla, Bitcoin and other assets to a rarely seen degree, setting the stage for another test of regulators’ tolerance for ultra-risky offerings.】

item.title: Citadel Securities 开始为小型银行处理交易
item.description: Citadel Securities 总裁吉姆-埃斯波西托（Jim Esposito）表示，Citadel Securities 已开始为中小银行处理交易，旨在为它们提供更好的固定收益证券定价。【原文：Citadel Securities has begun processing trades for small and mid-tier banks in a partnership aimed at providing them better pricing on fixed-income securities, according to President Jim Esposito.】

item.title: OpenAI 的 "金手指 "在股价飙升的同时不断扩散
item.description: 在与其他科技公司合作部署其人工智能产品方面，OpenAI 已经证明了自己的金手指。不过，它推动股价上涨的力量正在迅速扩散到它甚至短暂讨论过合作的公司。【原文：OpenAI has already proved it has a golden touch when it comes to partnering with other tech firms to deploy its artificial intelligence products. Its power to move shares, though, is rapidly spreading to companies it even briefly discusses teaming up with.】

item.title: 对美出口再度下降，特朗普关税加深巴西痛苦
item.description: 在两国总统进行 "积极的 "通话数小时后，周一公布的最新数据显示，巴西对美国的出口正受到这个世界最大经济体关税的冲击。【原文：Brazil’s exports to the U.S. are being crushed by tariffs from the world’s largest economy according to fresh data published on Monday, hours after a “positive” phone call between the presidents of both nations.】

item.title: Orsted 筹集 94 亿美元资金，应对美国风能政策转向带来的冲击
item.description: Orsted A/S 通过供股募集了 600 亿丹麦克朗（约合 94 亿美元），这对该公司应对风电行业面临的低迷形势至关重要。【原文：Orsted A/S raised 60 billion Danish kroner ($9.4 billion) through a rights offering that’s critical for the company to tackle the downturn facing the wind power industry.】

item.title: 高市获胜后交易员对日元的看涨情绪为 2022 年以来最低
item.description: 支持刺激政策的立法者佐佐江-高市（Sanae Takaichi）几乎肯定会成为下一任首相，这使得日元汇率暴跌，期权交易商三年多来最不看好日元。【原文：Options traders are least bullish on the Japanese yen in more than three years as pro-stimulus lawmaker Sanae Takaichi’s near-certain ascent to become the next prime minister sent the nation’s currency tumbling.】

item.title: 比特币期权交易商在创纪录的涨势后盯上了 14 万美元
item.description: 上周末，比特币突然创下历史新高，这让期权交易商增加了押注，认为这种最大的加密货币将反弹至 14 万美元。【原文：The sudden push to a fresh all-time high in Bitcoin over the weekend has options traders adding to bets that the largest cryptocurrency will rally to $140,000.】

item.title: 法国农业信贷银行推迟加元债券销售
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在法国总理周一意外辞职后，法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole SA）已推迟出售 10 年期加元债券。【原文：Credit Agricole SA has delayed selling a 10-year Canadian dollar bond after France’s prime minister resigned unexpectedly on Monday, according to people with knowledge of the transaction.】

item.title: OpenAI 让 ChatGPT 用户在应用程序中连接 Spotify 和 Zillow
item.description: OpenAI 正在让 ChatGPT 用户更容易地连接聊天机器人中的第三方应用程序来执行任务，这是该公司将其旗舰产品打造成数字服务关键入口的最新举措。通过周一在 OpenAI 年度开发者大会上发布的新选项，ChatGPT 用户可以要求为周末创建一个播放列表，该应用将连接 Spotify 提出建议。另外，用户还可以在 Zillow 上查找特定社区的三居室住宅。【原文：OpenAI is making it easier for ChatGPT users to connect with third-party apps within the chatbot to carry out tasks, the company’s latest bid to turn its flagship product into a key gateway for digital services. With the new option, unveiled Monday during OpenAI’s annual developers event, a ChatGPT user can ask to create a playlist for the weekend and the app will connect with Spotify to make suggestions. Alternatively, a user can look up a three-bedroom home in a specific neighborhood on Zillow】

item.title: 拉加德认为欧洲央行正朝着目标前进，增长逆风即将消退
item.description: 克里斯蒂娜-拉加德表示，欧洲央行已经确定了通胀目标，并预计经济将在2026年回暖。【原文：Christine Lagarde suggested the European Central Bank has circled in on its inflation target and expects the economy to pick up in 2026.】

item.title: Entergy 与 Hyperscalers 就路易斯安那州大型数据中心进行谈判
item.description: 据 Entergy Louisiana 首席执行官菲利普-梅（Phillip May）称，在 Meta Platforms 公司宣布计划在路易斯安那州北部建造最大的人工智能设施之后，多家科技公司正在寻求在该地区建造大型数据中心。【原文：Multiple technology companies are seeking to build large data centers in Northern Louisiana after Meta Platforms Inc. announced plans to construct its largest AI-focused facility in the region, according to Entergy Louisiana Chief Executive Officer Phillip May.】

item.title: 特朗普筹资风险令小额贷款市场投资者提高警惕
item.description: 总额达数十亿美元的联邦资金威胁不断敲响，这让市政投资者对评级较低的州和地方借款人重新产生了疑虑。【原文：The steady drum beat of federal funding threats totaling billions of dollars is renewing municipal investors’ qualms about lower-rated state and local borrowers.】

item.title: 美国关门造成数据空白，债券波动性崩溃
item.description: 由于美国政府停摆推迟了关键经济数据的发布，并使交易商失去了价格大幅波动的催化剂，国债市场的预期波动率已降至近四年来的最低点。【原文：Expected volatility in the Treasuries market has sunk to the lowest in almost four years as the US government shutdown delays key economic data releases and deprives traders of catalysts for large price swings.】

item.title: 人工智能将周期性转变为世俗性
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 西班牙 Naturgy 公司出让 3.5% 的股份以提高自由流通量
item.description: 西班牙 Naturgy Energy Group SA 公司正在发行 3.5% 的股份，以增加可在市场上交易的股票。【原文：Spain’s Naturgy Energy Group SA is offering a 3.5% stake in an effort to increase the stock available for trading in the market.】

item.title: 布鲁克林的新国会希望之星帮助黑石出售道奇队
item.description: 迈克尔-戈德法布（Michael Goldfarb）非常崇拜布鲁克林道奇队的传奇人物杰基-罗宾逊（Jackie Robinson），因此他在自己儿时的卧室里放了一块埃贝茨球场（Ebbets Field）的砖头。【原文：Michael Goldfarb so admired Brooklyn Dodgers legend Jackie Robinson that he kept a brick from Ebbets Field in his childhood bedroom.】

item.title: 欧洲化工巨头英力士计划削减德国产量
item.description: 化工巨头英力士集团有限公司（Ineos Group Ltd.）计划削减在德国的生产，将原因归咎于高昂的成本和廉价的进口产品。【原文：Chemicals giant Ineos Group Ltd. plans to cut production in Germany, blaming high costs and cheap imports.】

item.title: 壳牌领导的加拿大液化天然气公司将装载第二单元的第一批货物
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，壳牌加拿大液化天然气公司（LNG Canada）目前正按计划从该设施的第二套装置装载首批液化天然气货物，最快将于本周完成，因为该项目将在下个月继续加速推进。【原文：Shell Plc.’s LNG Canada is currently on track to load its first liquefied natural gas cargo from the facility’s second unit as soon as this week as the project continues to ramp up in the next month, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称若本周收益率攀升则买入国债
item.description: 对于国债市场来说，本周历来是糟糕的一周。摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的策略师表示，如果今年再次出现这种情况，投资者应该 "双手 "买入。【原文：For the Treasury market, this historically has been a bad week. If it happens again this year, Morgan Stanley strategists say investors should buy the dip “with both hands.”】

item.title: 新西兰央行将下调现金利率，经济学家对幅度看法不一
item.description: 预计新西兰央行将在本周降息，但经济学家对央行将以何种力度应对疲软的经济存在分歧。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank is expected to cut interest rates this week but economists are divided over how aggressively it will respond to the weak economy.】

item.title: 英国央行行长贝利表示，英国必须加大投资力度以迎接人工智能热潮
item.description: 英格兰银行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）表示，如果英国想从人工智能引发的经济繁荣中获得回报，就必须促进投资。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey said Britain must boost investment if it wants to reap the rewards from any economic boom triggered by artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 法国总统勒梅尔称其下台后可组建新内阁
item.description: 法国总理塞巴斯蒂安-勒科尔努辞职后，法国总统布鲁诺-勒梅尔表示，他已退出政府，以促进新内阁的组建。【原文：France’s Bruno Le Maire said he has stepped down from the government in order to facilitate the formation of a new cabinet after the resignation of Prime Minister Sebastien Lecornu.】

item.title: 原糖因大量交货反弹而创下三周新高
item.description: 原糖期货上涨了 1.7%，达到三周来的最高价。在交易商 Alvean 和 Cofco 成为 150 万吨 10 月合约交割量的最大接收者之后，市场从上周的下跌中恢复过来。【原文：Raw sugar futures rose as much as 1.7% to the highest price in three weeks. The market is recovering from a drop last week after traders Alvean and Cofco were the top receivers of a 1.5 million-ton delivery to settle the October contract.】

item.title: 教皇利奥将限制梵蒂冈银行在管理教廷基金方面的作用
item.description: 教皇利奥十四世正在改变罗马教廷金融投资活动的管理方式，有效削减梵蒂冈银行的权力。【原文：Pope Leo XIV is changing the management of the Holy See’s financial investment activities, effectively clipping the powers of the Vatican Bank.】

item.title: 风险溢价缩小，安哥拉考虑重返欧洲债券市场
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，安哥拉正在考虑今年出售欧元债券，因为这个石油资源丰富的国家的国际债务收益率继续从纪录高位回落，而且其他非洲国家也重返市场。【原文：Angola is considering selling eurobonds this year as yields on the oil-rich nation’s international debt continue to ease from record highs and other African countries return to the market, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 尼日利亚认为丹格特炼油厂具有系统重要性
item.description: 尼日利亚政府表示，阿里科-丹格特（Aliko Dangote）的炼油厂非常重要，不能倒闭，此前该公司与工会发生争执，工会威胁要切断炼油厂的原油供应。【原文：Aliko Dangote’s oil refinery is too important to fail, Nigeria’s government said, following the company’s dispute with labor unions that threatened to cut crude supply to the plant.】

item.title: 野村加密货币部门挖走银河系三名衍生品交易员
item.description: 随着加密期权市场的蓬勃发展，野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc.’s digital-assets subsidiary Laser Digital has recruited a trio of derivatives traders from Mike Novogratz’s Galaxy Digital, as the crypto options market booms.】
